dataset.name: Return to capital and growth rate of the world, 0-2200
dataset.description: Dates are actually ranges, with last date in range as displayed date. Ranges; 0-1000, 1000-1500, 1500-1700, 1700-1820, 1820-1913, 1913-1950, 1950-2012, 2012-2050, 2050-2100, 2100-2200. r after taxes; calculations from r before taxes assuming an average tax rate of 0% in 0-1913, 30% in 1913-2012, 10% in 2012-2050 and 0% in 2050-2100 (and capital losses of 2,5% per year in 1913-1950; and 0,5% per year in 1950-2012 to take into account public firm profits). Data from Piketty, Thomas, "Capital in the 21st Century, Harvard University Press", 2014
